mapper.select: SELECT AIRLINE_ID AS airline_id, AIRLINE_CODE AS airline_code, AIRLINE_NAME_EN AS airline_name_en, AIRLINE_NAME_KO AS airline_name_ko FROM AIRLINES ORDER BY AIRLINE_NAME_KO

SELECT AIRPORT_ID AS airport_id, AIRPORT_CODE AS airport_code, AIRPORT_NAME_EN AS airport_name_en, AIRPORT_NAME_KO AS airport_name_ko, CITY AS city, COUNTRY AS country FROM AIRPORTS ORDER BY CITY, AIRPORT_NAME_EN

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT flight_id, airline_code, flight_number, dep_airport_code, arr_airport_code, TO_CHAR(dep_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS dep_time, TO_CHAR(arr_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS arr_time, economy_charge, prestige_charge FROM FLIGHT_INFO ORDER BY dep_time ) f WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rn >= #{start}

SELECT flight_id, airline_code, flight_number, dep_airport_code, arr_airport_code, TO_CHAR(dep_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS dep_time, TO_CHAR(arr_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS arr_time, economy_charge, prestige_charge, FROM FLIGHT_INFO WHERE flight_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PASSENGERS(PASSENGER_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, PASSPORT_NUMBER, BIRTHDAY, SEX, EMAIL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES(#{passenger_id}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{passport_number}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{email}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT PASSENGER_ID AS passenger_id, FIRST_NAME AS first_name, LAST_NAME AS last_name, PASSPORT_NUMBER AS passport_number, BIRTHDAY, SEX, EMAIL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT AS updated_at FROM PASSENGERS WHERE PASSENGER_ID = #{passengerId}

SELECT PASSENGER_ID AS passenger_id, FIRST_NAME AS first_name, LAST_NAME AS last_name, PASSPORT_NUMBER AS passport_number, BIRTHDAY, SEX, EMAIL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT AS updated_at FROM PASSENGERS ORDER BY LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME
mapper.update: UPDATE PASSENGERS SET FIRST_NAME = #{first_name}, LAST_NAME = #{last_name}, PASSPORT_NUMBER = #{passport_number}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, SEX = #{sex}, EMAIL = #{email}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE PASSENGER_ID = #{passenger_id}
mapper.select: SELECT seat_id AS seatId, row_label AS rowLabel, col_num AS colNum, class AS seatClass FROM seat ORDER BY row_label, col_num
SELECT seat_id AS seatId, row_label AS rowLabel, col_num AS colNum, class AS seatClass FROM seat WHERE seat_id = #{seatId}

SELECT fs.flight_id AS flightId, fs.seat_id AS seatId, fs.status AS status, fs.booking_id AS bookingId, s.row_label AS "seat.rowLabel", s.col_num AS "seat.colNum", s.class AS "seat.seatClass" FROM flight_seat fs JOIN seat s ON fs.seat_id = s.seat_id WHERE fs.flight_id = #{flightId} ORDER BY s.row_label, s.col_num
